info.name: † Tumblr Cursive Banner/Header V2 †
info.description:
Replaces Tumblr's banner/header with a cursive design. Same as this style except it follows Tumblr's new banner with an outline with transparent text.

info.additionalInfo: Version 1.2 Change Log: 08/05/2016 // Reposted on new account. 26/07/2017 // Tidied up coding and updated credit to new username. Font used: Signarita Zhai
